channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GRA1/SGP1][Dedicated Servers] - Network equipment version upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 29, 21:00 UTC  -  Nov 30, 00:00 UTC

Aug 24, 17:44 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 29/11/2023 21:00 UTC
End time : 30/11/2023 00:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a version upgrade on multiple network equipment.

item.title: [Global][Dedicated Servers] - End of Life Real Time Monitoring APIv6
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 7, 09:30 - 10:00 UTC

Sep 22, 11:30 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 07/11/2023 09:30 UTC
End time : 07/11/2023 10:00 UTC
Service impact : The End of Life of Real Time Monitoring (RTM) for baremetal is scheduled for the 7th of November 2023.
Few customers will be impacted (less than 10) and will stop be able to monitor their dedicated servers via the APIv6. This will impact APIv6 calls /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/statistics.

item.title: [RBX1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 18204
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 5, 23:00 UTC  -  Nov 6, 05:00 UTC

Oct 17, 21:50 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 05/11/2023 23:00 UTC
End time : 06/11/2023 05:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in rack 18204 will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, our teams will move servers from rack 18204 to rack 18205.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Virtual Private Server] - Monitoring
item.description:
Oct 18, 12:09 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 11/10/2023 13:24 UTC
End time : 18/10/2023 06:58 UTC
Root cause : Software issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Oct 18, 06:58 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Oct 17, 12:52 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Oct 17, 12:08 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 11/10/2023 13:24 UTC
Service impact : The monitoring system (metrics) for the VPS service is no longer accessible in the manager/API.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - 41B10/41B13/41B14
item.description:
Oct 15, 11:37 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 15, 08:27 UTC
Update - Start time : 15/10/2023 08:02 UTC
End time : 15/10/2023 08:21 UTC
Service impact : Services are working as they should be.
Root cause : It was due to a malfunction on a power supply.

Oct 15, 08:24 UTC
Update - On racks 41B13, some servers and Public Network are still unreachable.

Oct 15, 08:22 UTC
Update - On racks 41B10 and 41B14, the situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.

Oct 15, 08:21 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Oct 15, 08:17 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 15/10/2023 08:02 UTC
Service impact : Servers are unreachable on these racks.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
